alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Palm Beach County through 915 PM EDT... At 845 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Golden Lakes, or near West Palm Beach, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Wellington, Palm Beach Gardens, Riviera Beach, Greenacres, Royal Palm Beach, North Palm Beach, Lake Park, Haverhill, Cloud Lake, Palm Beach International Airport, Port Of Palm Beach, Golden Lakes, Loxahatchee Groves, Gun Club Estates, Schall Circle, Royal Palm Estates, Lake Belvedere Estates, Downtown West Palm Beach and The Acreage. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
